name: 傅子恒
objective:
本課程以新媒體藝術 (New Media Art) 為範疇，以創意編程 (Creative Coding) 為主軸，帶領同學深入探索以程式媒材所能表現之力與美。課程內容涵蓋：新媒體藝術賞析、創意編程程式語言、創意編程常用演算法、渲染器製作等。觸發學員從美感出發之編程思維，設計具備美學穿透力之互動內容。

This course takes new media art as its scope and creative coding as its main path, leading students to deeply explore the power and beauty which programming media can express. The course contents include new media art appreciation, creative programming language, common algorithms for creative programming, render and shader. By triggering coding idea from aesthetics, we can realize more fantastic interactive contents with powerful penetration.
